1.verse: Isihlabo esisingisele kwiNineve. Incwadi yombono kaNahum wase-Elekoshe.

2.verse: UYehova nguThixo onobukhwele, ophindezelayo; uYehova ngumphindezeli obushushu bukhulu; uYehova ngumphindezeli kubachasi bakhe, ezigcinela iintshaba zakhe umsindo wakhe.

3.verse: UYehova uzeka kade umsindo, mkhulu ke ngamandla, ongakhe amenze msulwa onetyala; uYehova, indlela yakhe isesivunguvaneni naseluqhwitheleni, namafu aluthuli lweenyawo zakhe.

4.verse: Ukhalimela ulwandle, alutshise, ayomise nemilambo yonke;  intshwenyile iKarmele neBhashan, intshwenyile intyantyambo yaseLebhanon.

5.verse: Iintaba ziyanyikima phambi kwakhe, neenduli ziyanyibilika;  liyafukuka ihlabathi ebusweni bakhe, elimiweyo nabemi bonke abakulo.

6.verse: Ngubani na ongemayo phambi kobhavumo lwakhe? Ngubani na ongaziphakamisayo ekuvutheni komsindo wakhe? Ubushushu bakhe buphalazeka njengomlilo, namawa ayadilizwa nguye.

7.verse: UYehova ulungile, uligwiba ngemini yembandezelo; uyabazi abazimela ngaye.

8.verse: Ke uyayiphelisa indawo yayo ngomkhukula ehamba phandle,  azisukele iintshaba zakhe emnyameni

9.verse: Nicinga ntoni na ngoYehova? Uyaphelisa yena; imbandezelo ayisayi kuphakama izihlandlo ezibini.

10.verse: Kuba bofanelana bephinyelene ngokweziphingo, benxila yiwayini yabo emnandi: baya kudliwa kuphele, njengeendiza ezomileyo.

11.verse: Kuphume kuwe ocinga okubi ngoYehova, oceba ubutshijolo.

12.verse: Utsho uYehova ukuthi, Noko bapheleleyo, bebaninzi nokuba baninzi, baya kusikwa noko benjalo, badlule. Ndikucinezele nje,  andiyi kuphinda ndikucinezele.

13.verse: Ngoku ke ndiya kuyaphula idyokhwe yakhe, ingabikho kuwe;  ndiziqhawule izitropu zakho.

14.verse: Ke uYehova uwise umthetho ngawe, wokuba akusayi kuba sahlwayelwa nto inegama lakho; endlwini yothixo wakho ndowunqumla umfanekiso oqingqiweyo notyhidiweyo; ndiya kulenza ingcwaba akho; kuba wafunyanwa ulula.

15.verse: Yabonani, zisezintabeni iinyawo zabashumayela iindaba ezilungileyo, abavakalisa usindiso. Yenza imithendeleko yakho,  Yuda, zalisa izibhambathiso zakho; ngokuba akasayi kubuya acande kuwe olitshijolo; unqunyulwe kwaphela.

1.verse: Kunyuke umhlekezi, weza phambi kwakho, Nineve; londoloza inqaba yakho, bonisela endleleni, qinisa izinqe, khupha amandla kunene.

2.verse: Ngokuba uYehova ulibuyele iqhayiya lakwaYakobi ngokweqhayiya lakwaSirayeli; ngokuba abathi qongqololo bathe qongqololo;  bawonakalisile amasebe abo emidiliya.

3.verse: Ingweletshetshe yamagorha akhe yenziwe ingqombela, amadoda anobu kroti athiwe wambu ngezibomvu; iinqwelo zokulwa zinomlilo ophuma ezintsimbini ngemini yokuxhoba kwakhe, izinto zemisipres ziyatyityimba.

4.verse: Iinqwelo zokulwa ziyadlongozela ezitratweni, ziyagilana emabaleni; ukubonakala kwazo kunjengezikhuni ezitshangaziswayo,  zibaleka njengemibane.

5.verse: Ukhumbule iingangamsha zakhe; ziya kukhubeka ekuhambeni kwazo; zingxamela eludongeni lwayo, selimisiwe ikhuselo.

7.verse: Kugqityiwe kwelokuba iya kuhlutywa, imkiswe, nabakhonzazana bayo badumzele ngokwelizwi lamavukuthu, bebetha ezifubeni zabo.

8.verse: INineve injengechibi lamanzi, kususela koko yabakhoyo;  bayabaleka noko; kuba angathiwa, Yimani, yimani! hayi, akubikho uphethulayo.

9.verse: Phangani isilivere, phangani igolide; akunakuphela ukuxhotyiswa ngobuninzi beempahla zonke ezinqwenelekayo.

10.verse: Kuthe qongqololo, kwathi qongqololo, kwaba selubala;  intliziyo inyibilikile, amadolo ayagevezela; yinimba emanqeni onke, ubuso bonke buphela buba luthuthu.

11.verse: Siphi na isikhundla seengonyama, nedlelo elo leengonyama ezintsha, ebilihamba ingonyama induna nengonyamakazi, ithole lengonyama, kungekho wothusayo?

12.verse: Ingonyama le iqwenga okwanele amathole ayo, ikrwitshele iingonyamakazi zayo, izalise imingxuma yayo ngexhoba,  nezikhundla zayo ngento eqwengiweyo.

13.verse: Uthi uYehova wemikhosi, Yabona, ndikuchasile; ndozitshisa iinqwelo zakho zokulwa zibe ngumsi, ikrele lizidle iingonyama zakho ezintsha; ndilinqumle ehlabathini ixhoba lakho, lingabi savakala izwi labathunywa bakho.

1.verse: Yeha, umzi wamagazi! Uzele kwaphela luhanahaniso nakukudlavula; akumki kuwo ukuqwenga.

2.verse: Isithonga seziniya, nesithonga sokugoqoza kweevili,  nokuphala kwamahashe, nokuxhuma kweenqwelo zokulwa;

3.verse: abamahashe besenza amagqasi, ukubengezela kwamakrele,  nokumenyezela kwezikhali; ukuba baninzi ababuleweyo, izigigaba zabafileyo; ewe, azinakuphela izidumbu; bayakhubeka ezidumbini zabo;

4.verse: ngenxa yobuninzi bezihenyuzo zehenyukazi elihle, elinesoya,  umnikazi-kukhafula, othengisa iintlanga ngezihenyuzo zakhe,  nemizalwane ngokukhafula kwakhe.

5.verse: Uthi uYehova wemikhosi, Yabona, ndikuchasile; ndozityhila iingubo zakho, ndiziphose phezu kobuso bakho, ndizibonise iintlanga ubuze bakho; ndizibonise izikumkani ukucukucezwa kwakho.

6.verse: Ndiya kukugalela ngezinto ezinezothe, ndikwenze inqambi,  ndikwenze ube njengento ebonelwayo.

7.verse: Kuya kuthi, bonke abakubonayo bakubaleke, bathi, INineve ibhuqekile; ngubani na oya kuyikhuza? ndokufunela phi na abathuthuzeli?

8.verse: Uyidlule ngokulunga yini na iNo ka-Amon, eyamisa emijelweni yoMnayile, amanzi engeenxa zonke kuyo; elungqameko lwayo ibilulwandle, udonga lwayo lululwandle?

9.verse: Ayengamandla ayo amaKushi kwanamaYiputa, engenakuphela ndawo ke; amaPuti namaLubhi avengabancedisi bayo.

10.verse: Nayo ke leyo yafuduswa, yathinjwa, neentsana zayo zacunyuzwa ezimbonjeni zezitrato zonke; amadoda azukileyo kuyo bawenzela amaqashiso; bonke abakhulu kuyo babakhonkxa ngemixokelelwane.

11.verse: Nawe lo uya kunxila, uya kufihlakala; nawe lo uya kufuna igwiba ngenxa yotshaba.

12.verse: Zonke iinqaba zakho ziyimikhiwane enamakhiwane aqalelayo;  ukuba avuthululwe, owa emlonyeni wowadlayo.

13.verse: Yabona, abantu bakho bangamankazana phakathi kwakho apho;  avulekile amasango elizwe lakho, avulekela iintshaba zakho;  umlilo utshisa imivalo yakho.

14.verse: Zikhelele amanzi angqingo, qinisa iinqaba zakho; ngena eludakeni, uxovule udongwe; lungisa iziko lokutshisa izitena.

15.verse: Khona apho umlilo uya kukutshisa; ikrele liya kukunqumla,  liya kukudla njengenkumbi ekhothululayo. Zandise njengenkumbi ekhothululayo, zandise njengenkumbi eyandayo.

16.verse: Ubandisile ke abarhwebi bakho ngaphezu kweenkwenkwezi zezulu; inkumbi ekhothululayo igalelekile, yabhunyula, yabaleka yemka.

17.verse: Abaluluhle bakho banjengeenkumbi ezandayo, abathetheli bakho banjengemiqikela, ngemiqikela yeenkumbi, ezilalisa ezintangweni mhla ngengqele; lithi lingaphuma ilanga, zibaleke zimke, ingazeki indawo yazo, ukuba ziphi na.

18.verse: Balele abalusi bakho, kumkani Asiriya; zilele phantsi iingangamsha zakho; bathe phangalala abantu bakho ezintabeni,  akukho ubabuthayo.

19.verse: Akuhlangani ukwaphuka kwakho; inxeba lakho lelibulalayo.  Bonke abazivayo iindaba zakho babetha izandla ngawe; ngokuba ngubani na ezingadlulanga phezu kwakhe izinto zakho ezimbi ngamaxesha onke?
